main event: Two Air Police patrols reported a very bright light in the sky, appearing to travel a zig-zag path across the sky.
interesting points: The object was extremely bright, brighter than any known aircraft light.
The object disappeared from view at a high rate of speed when it moved out of the area under observation.
The object was under visual observation until it disappeared.
The sighting lasted for about 20 minutes.
The Air Force concluded that the sighting was most likely a SAC B-52 aircraft with sun reflection creating an unusual appearance.
sighted object: A very bright light in the sky
